1.name: Child's Play
1.description: A single mother gives her son a much sought-after doll for his birthday, only to discover that it is possessed by the soul of a serial killer.

2.name: Beetlejuice
2.description: The spirits of a deceased couple are harassed by an unbearable family that has moved into their home, and hire a malicious spirit to drive them out.

3.name: Coming to America
3.description: An extremely pampered African Prince travels to Queens, New York, and goes undercover to find a wife that he can respect for her intelligence and will.

4.name: Heathers
4.description: In order to get out of the snobby clique that is destroying her good-girl reputation, an intelligent teen teams up with a dark sociopath in a plot to kill the cool kids.

5.name: Die Hard
5.description: An NYPD officer tries to save his wife and several others taken hostage by German terrorists during a Christmas party at the Nakatomi Plaza in Los Angeles.

6.name: The Great Outdoors
6.description: A Chicago man's hope for a peaceful family vacation in the woods is shattered when the annoying in-laws drop in.

7.name: Akira
7.description: A secret military project endangers Neo-Tokyo when it turns a biker gang member into a rampaging psychic psychopath who can only be stopped by two teenagers and a group of psychics.

8.name: Willow
8.description: A reluctant dwarf must play a critical role in protecting a special baby from an evil queen.

9.name: Big
9.description: After wishing to be made big, a teenage boy wakes the next morning to find himself mysteriously in the body of an adult.

10.name: Rain Man
10.description: Selfish yuppie Charlie Babbitt's father left a fortune to his savant brother Raymond and a pittance to Charlie; they travel cross-country.

11.name: They Live
11.description: A drifter discovers a pair of sunglasses that allow him to wake up to the fact that aliens have taken over the Earth.

12.name: Mystic Pizza
12.description: Three teenage girls come of age while working at a pizza parlor in the Connecticut town of Mystic.

13.name: Cocktail
13.description: A talented New York City bartender takes a job at a bar in Jamaica and falls in love.

14.name: Who Framed Roger Rabbit
14.description: A toon-hating detective is a cartoon rabbit's only hope to prove his innocence when he is accused of murder.

15.name: Tonari no Totoro
15.description: When two girls move to the country to be near their ailing mother, they have adventures with the wondrous forest spirits who live nearby.

16.name: Hotaru no haka
16.description: A young boy and his little sister struggle to survive in Japan during World War II.

17.name: Beaches
17.description: A privileged rich debutante and a cynical struggling entertainer share a turbulent, but strong childhood friendship over the years.

18.name: Bull Durham
18.description: A fan who has an affair with one minor-league baseball player each season meets an up-and-coming pitcher and the experienced catcher assigned to him.

19.name: Alien Nation
19.description: In 1988, Earth makes the first contact with an alien civilization. In 1991, these aliens, known as Newcomers, slowly begin to be integrated into human society after three years of quarantine.

20.name: Mississippi Burning
20.description: Two F.B.I. Agents, with wildly different styles, arrive in Mississippi to investigate the disappearance of some civil rights activists.

21.name: Nuovo Cinema Paradiso
21.description: A filmmaker recalls his childhood when falling in love with the pictures at the cinema of his home village and forms a deep friendship with the cinema's projectionist.

22.name: Young Guns
22.description: A group of young gunmen, led by Billy the Kid, become deputies to avenge the murder of the rancher who became their benefactor. But when Billy takes their authority too far, they become the hunted.

23.name: Hairspray
23.description: A 'pleasantly plump' teenager teaches 1962 Baltimore a thing or two about integration after landing a spot on a local TV dance show.

24.name: The Blob
24.description: Remake of the 1958 sci-fi horror classic about a deadly blob from another planet which consumes everything in its path. Teenagers attempt without success to warn the townspeople, who refuse to take them seriously.

25.name: Caddyshack II
25.description: When a crass new-money tycoon's membership application is turned down at a snooty country club, he retaliates by buying the club and turning it into a tacky amusement park.

26.name: Bloodsport
26.description: Follows Frank Dux, an American martial artist serving in the military, who decides to leave the army to compete in a martial arts tournament in Hong Kong where fights to the death can occur.

27.name: Dangerous Liaisons
27.description: A scheming widow and her manipulative ex-lover make a bet regarding the corruption of a recently married woman.

28.name: The Adventures of Baron Munchausen
28.description: An account of Baron Munchausen's supposed travels and fantastical experiences with his band of misfits.

29.name: Killer Klowns from Outer Space
29.description: Aliens who look like clowns come from outer space and terrorize a small town.

30.name: Rambo III
30.description: Rambo mounts a one-man mission to rescue his friend Colonel Trautman from the clutches of the formidable invading Soviet forces in Afghanistan.

31.name: Twins
31.description: A physically perfect but innocent man goes in search of his long-lost twin brother, who is short, a womanizer, and small-time crook.

32.name: A Fish Called Wanda
32.description: In London, four very different people team up to commit armed robbery, then try to doublecross each other for the loot.

33.name: The Accused
33.description: After a young woman suffers a brutal gang rape in a bar one night, a prosecutor assists in bringing the perpetrators to justice, including the ones who encouraged and cheered on the attack.

34.name: The Naked Gun: From the Files of Police Squad!
34.description: Incompetent police Detective Frank Drebin must foil an attempt to assassinate Queen Elizabeth II.

35.name: Red Heat
35.description: A tough Russian policeman is forced to partner up with a cocky Chicago police detective when he is sent to Chicago to apprehend a Georgian drug lord who killed his partner and fled the country.

36.name: The Unbearable Lightness of Being
36.description: In 1968, a Czech doctor with an active sex life meets a woman who wants monogamy, and then the Soviet invasion further disrupts their lives.

37.name: Dirty Rotten Scoundrels
37.description: Two con men try to settle their rivalry by betting on who can swindle a young American heiress out of fifty thousand dollars first.

38.name: Mac and Me
38.description: An alien trying to escape from NASA is befriended by a wheelchair-bound boy.

39.name: The Land Before Time
39.description: An orphaned brontosaurus teams up with other young dinosaurs in order to reunite with their families in a valley.

40.name: Midnight Run
40.description: An accountant is chased by bounty hunters, the F.B.I., and the Mafia after jumping bail.

41.name: Le grand bleu
41.description: The rivalry between Enzo and Jacques, two childhood friends and now world-renowned free divers, becomes a beautiful and perilous journey into oneself and the unknown.

42.name: Working Girl
42.description: When a secretary's idea is stolen by her boss, she seizes an opportunity to steal it back by pretending she has her boss' job.

43.name: Two Moon Junction
43.description: A young Southern débutante temporarily abandons her posh lifestyle and upcoming, semi-arranged marriage to have a lustful and erotic fling with a rugged drifter who works at a local carnival.

44.name: Dead Ringers
44.description: Twin gynecologists take full advantage of the fact that nobody can tell them apart, until their relationship begins to deteriorate over a woman.

45.name: Pumpkinhead
45.description: After a tragic accident, a man conjures up a towering, vengeful demon called Pumpkinhead to destroy a group of unsuspecting teenagers.

46.name: Torch Song Trilogy
46.description: Tony Award-winning actor and playwright Harvey Fierstein re-creates his role as the unsinkable Arnold Beckoff in this film adaptation of the smash Broadway play TORCH SONG TRILOGY. A very ...                See full summary »

47.name: My Stepmother Is an Alien
47.description: A creature from another planet tries to seduce a shy Earth physicist to gain control over his researches. The result of this important mission much exceeded her expectations.

48.name: The Last Temptation of Christ
48.description: The life of Jesus Christ, his journey through life as he faces the struggles all humans do, and his final temptation on the cross.

49.name: Friday the 13th Part VII: The New Blood
49.description: Years after Tommy Jarvis chained him underwater at Camp Crystal Lake, the dormant Jason Voorhees is accidentally released from his prison by a telekinetic teenager. Now, only she can stop him.

50.name: Earth Girls Are Easy
50.description: A Southern California girl befriends three furry aliens after their spaceship lands in her swimming pool.
